HS_code_description: Residual products of the chemical or allied industries, not elsewhere specified or included; municipal waste; sewage sludge; other wastes specified in Note 6 to this Chapter
Waste, parings and scrap, of plastics
Waste, parings and scrap of rubber (other than hard rubber) and powders and granules obtained therefrom

Fuel wood, in logs, in billets, in twigs, in faggots or in similar forms; wood in chips or particles; sawdust and wood waste and scrap, whether or not agglomerated in logs, briquettes, pellets or similar forms
Chemical wood pulp, sulphite, other than dissolving grades
Cullet and other waste and scrap of glass, excluding glass from cathode-ray tubes or other activated glass of heading 85.49; glass in the mass
Ferrous waste and scrap; remelting scrap ingots of iron or steel
Unrefined copper; copper anodes for electrolytic refining
Electrical and electronic waste and scrap
